pkgmetadata.longdescription: Multivariate Difference Between Two Groups // Estimation of multivariate differences between two groups (e.g., multivariate sex differences) with regularized regression methods and predictive approach. See Lnnqvist Ilmarinen (2021) doi:10.1007/s11109-021-09681-2 and Ilmarinen et al. (2021) doi:10.31234/osf.io/j59bs.
